downloadTitle: Data Workload Assessment Model and Tool
downloadDescription: Data Workload Assessment Model and Tool

downloadFile.name: Data Workload Assessment Model and Tool.zip

detailsSection: Excel based tool is based on set of 41 questions across 12 categories. The tool provides a simple one-click calculation and report generation, helping to accelerate large assessments by providing automated and uniform target platform decision process.
detailsSection_file_name: Data Workload Assessment Model and Tool.zip
systemRequirementsSection: • The files comprise a zipped folder that contains the tool and instructions
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
